Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • Graph

  • public class Graph
extends java.lang.Object
    A Graph class. Contains:
    • The nodes that can be parsed.
    • The neighbors of each node.
    • The taxis.
    • The client coordinates.
    Classes used:
    • ArrayList which contains the nodes.
    • HashMap which contains the neighbors for each node.
    • ArrayList which contains the taxis
    • Coordinates for the client coordinates.
    See Also:
    Coordinates

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Graph(java.lang.String nodefile, java.lang.String taxifile, java.lang.String clientfile)
      The constructor of the class.
      Read the nodes, taxis and client files and make the according sets of objects.
      For the neighbors we use a HashMap in which the keys are Coordinates which helps us find same coordinates throughout the nodes and let them have different neighbors (even if the IDs are different).

    • Constructor Detail

      • Graph

        public Graph(java.lang.String nodefile,
             java.lang.String taxifile,
             java.lang.String clientfile)
        The constructor of the class.
        Read the nodes, taxis and client files and make the according sets of objects.
        For the neighbors we use a HashMap in which the keys are Coordinates which helps us find same coordinates throughout the nodes and let them have different neighbors (even if the IDs are different). Moreover neighbors are the coordinates with the same ID and are next and previous in the nodes file.
        Parameters:
        nodefile - The nodes.csv
        taxifile - The taxis.csv
        clientfile - The client.csv

    • Method Detail

      • getTaxis

        public java.util.ArrayList<Taxi> getTaxis()
        Get the taxis array.
        Returns:
        The ArrayList containing Taxis.

      • findClosest

        public Coordinates findClosest(Coordinates co)
        Some taxi coordinates may not be in the nodes.csv. With this function we match them with the closest.
        Parameters:
        co - The real coordinates of the taxi.
        Returns:
        The fixed coordinates of the taxi.

      • getEnd

        public Coordinates getEnd()
        Client coordinates.
        Returns:
        The client coordinates.

      • heuristic

        public double heuristic(Coordinates node)
        Implements the heuristic function used for the A* fScore. Finds the euclidean distance between the client and the current node.
        Parameters:
        node - The Coordinates to find the cost from.
        Returns:
        The distance between client and node.

      • getNeighbors

        public java.util.Collection<Coordinates> getNeighbors(Coordinates node)
        Gets the neighbors from the HashMap for this node.
        Parameters:
        node - The Coordinates for which the neighbors are to be returned.
        Returns:
        The node's neighbors.
